title: Budget 2022 | What the finance minister is doing ‘indirectly’ for consumption - Moneycontrol
content: Budget 2022 | What the finance minister is doing ‘indirectly’ for consumption  Moneycontrol
description: Budget 2022 | Big-bang announcements to spur consumption were missing but a host of initiatives on creating employment opportunities as well as a 35 percent increase in capital expenditure would help in boosting demand in the long to medium term, say experts.
